Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Client

Class ClientRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Client.ClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, CommonClientInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ClientInterface, CommonClientInterface
This is the class for those clients who decide to connect via RMI
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • setStarterCards

      public void setStarterCards(HashMap<String,Integer> starters, Symbol goldTop, Symbol resourceTop, int[] goldGround, int[] resourceGround)
      Method to set and display the information to choose the starter card face
      Specified by:
      setStarterCards in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      starters - the HashMap containing as key: the nickname of each player, as value: their starter cards
      goldTop - the kingdom of the card on top of the gold deck
      resourceTop - the kingdom of the card on top of the resource deck
      goldGround - the id of the gold cards on the ground
      resourceGround - the id of the resource cards on the ground

    • setChoosingObjective

      public void setChoosingObjective(int[] obj, int[] hand, Symbol topG, Symbol topR, HashMap<String,Boolean> starterFacings, HashMap<String,Color> playersColors, HashMap<String,String[]> handsColors, String[] phrases, HashMap<String,VisibleElements> pve)
      Method to set and show the information to choose the objective card
      Specified by:
      setChoosingObjective in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      obj - array with the id of the two objectives from which to choose and the two common objective cards
      hand - the hand of the player
      topG - the kingdom of the card on top of the gold deck
      topR - the kingdom of the card on top of the resource deck
      starterFacings - the faces of the starters of every player
      playersColors - the color of the pawns of every player
      handsColors - the kingdoms of the cards in the hand of every player
      phrases - message to display
      pve - VisibleElements of every player

    • confirmedDraw

      public void confirmedDraw(int cardDrawnId, int goldFaceUp1Id, int goldFaceUp2Id, int resFaceUp1Id, int resFaceUp2Id, Symbol goldTopCardSymbol, Symbol resTopCardSymbol) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:
      confirmedDraw in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      cardDrawnId - id of the card drawn
      goldFaceUp1Id - id of one of the gold card on the ground

      resFaceUp2Id - id of one of the resource card on the ground

    • otherDrawUpdate

      Method to notify other player's draw
      Specified by:
      otherDrawUpdate in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player who has drawn
      resourceFaceUp1Id - id of one of the resource cards on the ground

      goldFaceUp2Id - id of one of the gold cards on the ground
      resourceTopCardSymbol - id of the resource card on top of the deck
      goldTopCardSymbol - id of the gold cards on top of the deck
      cardDrawnId - id of the card drawn
      playerHandCardColors - hashMap of the players and their cards in the hands

      RemoteException
